div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo
sexto die menis Junij anno quosupra

The saide day Johnne myllar grantit him awande to the chapalanis
of Sanct nicholes kirk of aberdene v markis

The saide day Willaime Wormet grantit him awande to Wischear
francheman thre crovnys quhilkis the ballies chargit him to pay
within terme of lawe

The saide It was sufficiently previt that cristiane Wellem had
pait tile alexander scrogis or he decessit vj schillingis of his mertymes
maile tocum and the haile Witsonday maile bigane and xxij d' to William
scrogis of the saide mertimes tocum

Eodem die mariota murray amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex
ore Johannis Ratre prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis chamer
Et Idem Johannes quitus de omni perturbio dicti mariote

The said thomas lesly admittit master Androw craufurd James strachan
straloche and Dauid straloche procuratouris for Williame Rollande
becaus' thai war constitut be the said William befor the said ballie
obefor

The said master Androue craufurd' and Dauid straloche
procuratouris for Williame rolalnde offerit thame reddy
in the name and behalf of the said Williame to fulfill ale thingis
conenit in the act of the buk maid obefor betuix the said Williame
and Dauid colp anent the expensis and costis maid be the said William
vppoune' ane lande pertenyng to the said Dauid And atour chesit
gilbert menyeis and thomas Waus auditouris for the said Williame to
decid' apone the said mater and deliuer tharapone eftir the forme of the
first sene the personis that was chosin betuix thame obefor had nocht
deliuerit tharapone And the ballies offerit thame reddy to do Justice
to the partiis

The xxviij day of June the yer forsaide thomas leslie oblist him fathtfullie
to keipe warande ande defende Jonhe blak pynor and Stabillar skathles
of Sextene Schillingis that he causit him to gif tile Androw mortymar
quhilkis the saide Androw at commavnde of the officiaris of the tone pait
to the larde of allirdes procurator to Jonhne malisone for his annuell
tat he wantit of the lande qhar the saide Johne blak duellis
quhene it lay wast eftir Sandy stabillar flittit out of It

Curia balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo
die Junij Anno quosupra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod gilbertus mernoche
est legittimis et propinquior heres quondam Alexandrj mernoche patris suj

The saide day it was statut ande ordanit be the alderman baillies
ande counsaile present for the tyme that the baxtaris sal bak tua penny
brede' gud the clene stuff weile baakin contenynde xxiiij vnce and penny
Brede contenyng xij vnce and thai haue stuff reddy to serue the towne

The saide day the court wardit schew for lawe and It was gevin for dome
tha thte borght' fundyne be gilbert menyeis vppone ser Johnne Ruthirfurde
in the handis of Androw nachtie that he hade cumin tile his clame of xxxv
s' ande vj d' for j eln and demi quartaris of paris' Red ande ane vnce of blak
sewin silke was fundin avale in falt of mildesene Ande the ballies chargit Androw nachtj
officiar to pas to he said knycht ande charge him to pay the said Some within
terme of lawe

Eodem die Johnanes lyntone amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex
ore Johannis Ratre prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio mariorie moir Et
Idem marioria quitus fuit de omni perturbio dicti Johannis

The said day James Kennerty grantit him awande to Richerd Redhed
xiiijor d' quhilkis the ballies chargit him to pay within terme of lawe

The saide day Richerde redhed oblist him his landis and gudis that the
pot deliuerit to Dauy talyour be James Kennerty procurator to the ayris of Johne'
Westlande salbe responsal to Johne' malison' and his ayris quhen euir thai
Wil outgret and the saide Dauy is oblist to freithe the saide Ricahrde
tharanent but fraud' et cetera

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto
die mensis Julij Anno Dominj millesimo et cetera quingentesimo s'

The saide day the Alderman ballies counsaile and communite present for
the tyme warnyt be the hand bell throue the haile towne at the
Requeist of our Souerane lordis lettres grantit thar commone hande
bell with ale proffitis to William colp cristiane turing his spouse
ande Dauid colp his sone to the langast levar of thame thai doand
seruice tharfor aucht ande wont ande ordanit to gif thar commone
Seill tharapone'

The saide day the Aldirman baillies and diuers' of the counsale and
communite present for the tim representand the body of the towne grauntit to pay
to Johne of mar ballie passand to the Chakar in the townis erandis
fyve schillingis ilkane day to his expensis ilk that he Remanis in the townys
erandis

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene' tenta in prtorio eiusdem Septimo die
mensis Julij Anno Dominj et cetera

The saide day Williame andersone Chesit James collisone' Androw Cullan
ande master Walter layng for him mariory gethane and margaret gethane chesit
gilbert menyeis maister Johnne baidienagh' ande Johnne' of Ratre for thame Ande
alexander Rede odman to Sit heir consider ande vnderstande the clame debatabaile
betuix thame' Anent ane lande liande in the nethirkirkgat And' gif thai cane aggre
tharapone thai sall gif furtht that sentence betuix this and lammess' nixt tocum And gif
thai aggre nocht it salbe lesum to thame to persew the lawe

The said day Elisibeth' traile the wif of malcome was maide quyt be ane
suorne assis' gilbert menyeis forspekar of thre hydis clamyt be
francheman

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ixo die
mensis Julij Anno quo Supra

The saide day mariory auchneiwe with Alexander rede hir' forspekar askit
askit ane Siluirit belt fra Jonhne of Auchneiwe quhilk scho left
in jis kepin' Ande the saide Johne allegit that scho hade gevin the saide
belt to his douchtir and askit ane day to preiwe it gevin his douchtir
And the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis
to the said Johne to prewe Sufficientlie befor tham the saide belt
gevin to his douchtir

The saide day Jonhe Clerk in Drvm grantit him aving to gilbert
menyes ane Dusane of lax Salmonde

Eodem die Agnes aduardsone conucita per assisam Juratam
ex ore Andrea murray prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Alexandri
ramsay Et Idem Alexander pro perturbio dicte Agnetis et quilibet
alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day It was deliuerit and ordanit with consent and
assent of Androw Cullane and Williame Walcar' that the
said' Williame sal pay to the saide Androw xj s'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tetna In pretorio eiusdem
xiiijo die Julij anno quo Supra

The saide day the borghe' fundin be Jonhne arthour apon'
Johne Stile for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xix s'
and xj d' for ane hors' was fundin avale be ane Suorn'
assis' Johne Ratre forspekar for the quhilkis the saide Johne
Stile was in Ane amerciment of the court and to pay the saide
Some

Eodem die Andreas mortymar conuictus per assisam Juratam
ex ore Johannis Retre prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Willelmj
Coupar Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt quam assisam preposito
et ballivis referebant ad Satisfaciendum parti et Consequentes
Idem prepositus et balliuj ordinarunt prefatum Andream petere veniens
a prefato Willelmo et cetera et si in postrum ipsum aut quemcumque alium
perturbauerit Inde conuictus fuerit ad soluendum xxti s' fabrice ecclesie Sanct Nicholaij

The saide day William harpar grantit him avande to Alexander prat x s' of his Witsonday
male and he allegit ij s' pait to the saide alexandris douchtir for the quhilkis x s'
thomas chapman come Souerte to be pait at lammes next to Cum and the saide Williame
oblist him to freithe thomas of the pament of the saide a s' Ande gif the saide
Willaime preuis nocht the said ij s' pait he sale ansuir for the pament of It

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxjo die Julij
anno quo Supra

The saide day Alexander chamer producit ane lettir of the decret of the lordis of consal
vndir the Signet of the quhilkis the tenor follouis James be the grace of gode
kinge of Scottis To the aldermane and balyeis of oure burgh' of Aberdene' gretinge
fforsamekile as It is humlie menit ande schevin to ws be oure louit seruitour Alexander
Chamer burges of Aberdene' in the name ande behalue of Thomas chamer the sone
ande ayr of vmquhill thomas chamer brudir to the saide alexander ande als the bruthir sone
ande ayr to vmquhill Williame chamer the saie alexander yongar bruthir quhilk Is nowe
latlie decessit thar quhare the saide thomas now furthe of oure Realme . beyond sey in
his merchandice quhilk Is heritar' to ane burrowlande ande tenment liande in the gallougat
of oure said burghe' betuix the lande of vmquhill Richard' Kintor one the northt' part
ande the lande of Johne' leslie of Warderis one the Southt' part perteninge to him in here
tage as Is allegit throwe the deces' of the saide vmquhill thomas his fadire /
Neuirtheles' Katrine prat mothir to the saide thomas has distroit ande lattin fal dovne'
ane hous' of the saide tenment togiddir witht' the yarde of the samyne to his gret
dampnage ande skaithe' ande contrar Justice ande sa be Oure will Is herfor
ande we charge youe stratlie ande commandis that Incontinent thire oure lettres sene
ye pas and tele the saide Katrine' befor youe ande caus' hire to mak the saide bigiage
tenment ande yarde of the sammyne als gude as thai ware quhen' scho Entirit tharto
ande thar yhe tak sufficient caucioun' ande souertj of the saide Katrine that thai salbe
left elikwis' als' gude at hire furthpassigne fra the saides landis as thai war
quhen' shco entirit to the samyne Ande atour becuas the saide Alexandiris
fadir bruthir to the saide thomas nerest and mast tendir to the haue the keping and
gouernance of his heretage ayrschipe ande gudis now in his absence furthe'
of oure realme that tharfor he intromett witht the tenmentis bigingis takis stedyngis
ande vthir movabile gudis perteninge to the saide thomas be resone of arschipe
throue the deces' of the saide vmquhill Williame his fadir brudir quhill his
cumin withtin oure Realme quhar thar Is nane vthir personis in state nor
desing in the saide tenmentis landis ande bigingis the saide alexander findand
Caucioun' to ws for the profittis of the samyne' as efferis ande this ye do as
ye will ansuer to ws tharuppone' ande vndir ale pane and charge that eftir
maij followe Deliueringe thire oure lettres be youe deuly execut ande
Indorsat agane to the berar gevin vnder out signet at Edinburghe'
the xv day of marche ande of oure Regne the xv yer . et cetera deliberacione dominorum consilij et cetera Douglas
quhilk lettir being rede the vndirstande
the saide Alexander askit deliuerance of the said
gudis of ayrschip eftir the tenor of the said lettres
Ande the said margaret Offerit hir' Redy to deliuer
the samyn gudis scho havande Sufficient Caucion' tharfor as efferis

add.foreign: caucio Alexandri chamer reperta margarete Kintor

div.p:
The saide day gilbert menyes Come Souerte be his hande landis and gudis
to margaret Kintor the relict of vmquhile Williame chamer to keip defende
and warande hir' and the executouris of the said' Williame thar ayris executouris and
assignez' skathles and fre of ale gudis of airschip pertening to the ayr' and ayris
of vmquhile the saide Williame extending to tuenty pundis resauit
fra the said' margaret in tyme of the making of the act be Alexander
chamer at commavnde of our' Souerane lordis Ande the saide Alexander
chamer oblist him his ayris executouris and assignez be his hande landis and gudis
to freithe releiwe warande and defende the saide gilbert his ayris
executoris and assignez' skathles and fre of the said' Caucion and Souerte
Anent the saide Ayrschipe at ale handis quhome It efferis

The saide day Johne auchneiwe grantit to gif tile Alexander Rede ane siluir
belt and the saide Alexander gratit to tak It

The saide day Johne auchneiwe grantit to gif to Alexander rede ane
belt for alsmekile of his geir'

The gravnt of the assedacionis of wattis and fischingis for the furnising of the
honorabill men' passand' tile our Souerance lordis marage

The saide day the ballieis Counsale ande Communite Warnit and chargit be
the hande bell throw the haill tovne Ande be the sergeandis at commavnde
of our Souerane lordis lettres for the passage of ane part of the best and wortheast
of the samyn to the fest of our Souerane lordis mariage Ande ane
gret part and multitude of the Consale and Communite gathtreit representande
the bodie of the toune ande Circualie Inquerit be Johne mar ande
thomas leslie balyeis and Williame scrimgeour sergeande grantit Consentit
and ordanit to Set and to formaile lett ane thridpart of nethis fisching
one the wattir of Done for threttene yeris Ande ane Sexparte of
thar fischingis of the Crovis for xvj yeris quhilkis thridpart nethis
fischingis vmquhile Willaime chamer hede in tak obefor Ande Androw
murray the saide Sexpart of the crovis for the prouisione of expensis
to thame that pass' to the saide fest of our Souerane lordis mariage
et cetera Ande chesit Alexnader menyeis aldirman Robert blinsele Alexander chamer
Alexander Rede Alexander mar' Will futhes and Johne rettre commissaris to Set the saide fischingis
for the saide termes Ande ordanit ane commission' to be gevin to tham
vndir thar common Sele quhilkis personis Suer' the gritt aithe to Sett
the samyn fischingis eftir thar constrenye and knavlege for the commone Wele
and profit of the toune Ande ordanit the keparis of the commone sele
to Sele the said' commissionez' ane and may concerning the sad'
takis Ande ordanit to tak the formale of the said' thridpartis
fischingis of Done fra the personis or personis that thai sett it
to or fra margaret of Kintor now Josaris of the samyn gif
Scho will tak th saide thridpartis fishcingis for xiij yeris
and pay the formale tharof Item thai Assignit the maile of
ane half nethis fischingis of mydchingile extending to fiwe
barellis x s' and v d' in the yer' to the bigin of the kirk werk of Abirdene
Interchangit and Assignit for the said' thridpartis maile of Done
Ande ordanit lettres to be red' tharupon' of Assignacioun' and
Interchange one the Souerastwys' and to be Selit with thar common
Sell

add.foreign: Assedacio de le Rude malys Willelmo scrimgeour

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman ballieis ande Consale set and to forme
lett And' be this ak Setti and to forme lattis to William
scrimgeour ale and haill the rude malys of this burghe for
ale the termes of Sevin yeris he entirand' with the said'
malis at Witsonday immediate preceden' the dat of this act
Ande frathinfurtht to Joys' and bruk the samyn for ale the termes of
Sevin yeris continualie to be runnyn he payande yerlie Ilkan yer'
to the tovne or thar assignez' fyve li' and tene schillingis
Ande the saide Williame pait to sere Androw Coupar chaplane at the tovnis
commavnde fyftj schillingis and fiwe Schillingis to the aldirman of the
Witsonday terme at his Entre for the quhilkis he salbe fra
at the last terme of his Assedacioun'

The saide day the aldirman ballieis Consal and Communite present for the
tyme representande the bodie of the tovne grantit licence to
Johane mar ane of thair Clerkis of the queir to pass' to the scul'
tile his Instructioun' Ande resaue and admittit Cristy Narne
his deput and substitut to the seruing of his saide Clerkschipe
Vnto the Agan Cumin of the saide Johne

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiiijto
die Julij anno quosupra

The saide day the Counsale ordanit ande chargit gilbert
menyeis to pay to deliuer to Alexander menyes aldirmane tuenty
Markis of the xl merkis being' in his ahndis quhile the
auditoris of his Comptis syt her' and Conclude the samyn'

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and Consale Assignit to thar
commone menstrallis tene li' to be takin fra the denys of
gilde to furnys' thame to the passage with the aldirman and vthiris
honorabil' nychtbouris to the fest of our Souerane lordis mariage
at commavnde of his hienes and to the plesour of his maieste

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxviij die Julij Anno quo Supra

The saide day Jonhne of chamer grantit him avande to William
rate ane barrell of Salmonde quhilkis the balyeis char/
git him to pay within terme of law

The saide day Jonhne lunysdaile was quyt be ane suorne
assis' Alexnader King forspekar of ale clame of yerne and clvis
clamyt be cristiane mortymar' for et cetera

The saide day the wif patry chernside offerit hir' Redy
In hir husbandis nayme to deliuer pennyworthtis to the
officiaris to the frethin of him Anent the Some aving
to Johne Robertsone

The saide day the aldirman ordanit and chargit Androw
nachtj sergeand' to resaue the gudis fra the Spous' of Patry
chernside and mak redy Siluir tharof to the pament of the
Some aving to Jhone Robertsone

The said' day It was deliuerit and fundin be ane Suorne assis'
Androw Cullane forspeakar that thai coud' nocht acquyt Jonhne of Kennertj
and Alexander Kennart nory of the strubulance of thomas Johne brovne Inglisman
for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in ane Amerciament of the court and to
amend' as law will and forber' in tym' to Cum

The saide day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Androw Cullan
forspeakar that thai coude nocht acquit Jonhne Kennertj and Alexander nory
for the wranguis' Intrometting and avay having of tua barrellis of
Salmonde fra the key of abirdene pertening to Johne Small Inglisman quhilkis
he bocht fra Johne of balcrome and pait for tham for the quhilkis Ilkan
of thame was in Ane Amerciament of the court and to Amende as law will
and forbeir' in tyme to Cum et cetera

The saide day Johne smale Inglismane fforspeakar for Johne' brovne
Inglismane complenit to the alderman and bailyeis of the saide burghe'
that Johne' Kennerty ande Alexander nory hede strubolit the saide Johne brovne'
The saides Johne' Kennerty ande Alexander denyt the saide strubulance
and thareftire I the saide actioun' was put to the decesione' of ane assis'
of thir personis vnder writin witht consent of the saide partiis that Is to say
Androw cullane Alexander mar Robert crag Williame futhes Duncan
collsione' patry Reide Williame' Kintor Johne' arthour Johne chepman
mathow branche' thome Watson' Sande malisone' ande Androw meldrum
quhilkis suorne the gret aitht witnes previt ande allegacionis of bath
the partiis producit harde ande vndirstandin deliuerit all in ane voice
concordand' that thai coutht' nocht acquit the saides Johne' Kennerty ande
Alexander nory for strubulance of the saide Johne brovne Inglismane
for the quhilkis the saides Johne' Kennerty ande Alexander nory
Ilkane of thame was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera to amend' as law
will ande forbeir in tyme to cum

The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be the saide assis' ale in
ane woice concordande the gret aitht suorne that thai coutht' nocht acquyt
Johne' Kennerty ande Alexander nory of the wranguis' ande Intro
mettinge ande avay takin of tua barrell of Salmond' gyrlsis' fisch fra
the key of Aberdene pertening to Johne' smale Inglisman ande
bocht ande ressauit fra johne' balcromy for the quhilkis Ilknae
of the saides Johne' of Kennerty ande Alexander mory was in
ane' amerciament of the court et cetera Ande tile amend' as law will Ande
forbeir in tyme to cum
